name: Find The Teleport Pads
description:
(Very Early Access) Find the Teleport Pads and teleport to victory! Find The Teleport Pads is a small game developed by Recorder Central. You are a stone cube that is lost and needs to return home. To return home, you must search for the invisible teleport pads that will teleport you back home. Good Luck! 

Don't expect much from this game currently as it is very buggy and glitchy, it is about 10% complete and only has two levels that aren't that good :)
